movies.title: Der Junge mit dem großen schwarzen Hund

biography.bio: Niels Anschütz is an actor, known for Der Junge mit dem großen schwarzen Hund (1986).
biography.name: Niels Anschütz

biography.bio: Miriam Knabe is an actress, known for Der Junge mit dem großen schwarzen Hund (1986).
biography.name: Miriam Knabe

biography.placeOfBirth: Reetz, Kreis Arnswalde, Germany [now Recz, Poland]
biography.bio: Kurt Böwe was born on April 28, 1929 in Reetz, Kreis Arnswalde, Germany. He was an actor, known for Jadup und Boel (1980), Bukow and König (1971) and Märkische Forschungen (1982). He was married to Heidemarie Schönknecht. He died on June 14, 2000 in Berlin, Germany.
biography.name: Kurt Böwe

biography.bio: Dagmar Manzel was born on September 1, 1958 in East Berlin, East Germany. She is an actress, known for City of War: The Story of John Rabe (2009), Coming Out (1989) and Schtonk (1992). She is married to Robert Gallinowski. She was previously married to Marcus Kaloff.
biography.name: Dagmar Manzel

biography.bio: Horst Hiemer was born on April 22, 1933 in Ratibor, Silesia, Germany. He is an actor, known for Held for Questioning (1983), Tod in der Kurve (1971) and Clavigo (1978).
biography.name: Horst Hiemer

biography.bio: Jana Blunert is an actress, known for Der Junge mit dem großen schwarzen Hund (1986).
biography.name: Jana Blunert

biography.bio: Rita Feldmeier was born on February 28, 1954 in Rostock, German Democratic Republic. She is an actress, known for The Architects (1990), Oublie l'Amérique (2000) and Heiter bis tödlich - Akte Ex (2012).
biography.name: Rita Feldmeier

biography.bio: Sabrina Haseloff is an actress, known for Der Junge mit dem großen schwarzen Hund (1986).
biography.name: Sabrina Haseloff

biography.bio: Michael Klobe was born on February 8, 1950 in East Berlin, East Germany. He is an actor, known for Jailbirds (1996), La poursuite infernale (1994) and Sun Alley (1999).
biography.name: Michael Klobe

biography.bio: Wolfgang Krone is an actor and director, known for Short Sharp Shock (1998), A Strange Love (1984) and Fauna, Flora, Fledermaus (1969).
biography.name: Wolfgang Krone

biography.placeOfBirth: Stettin, Pomerania, Germany [now Szczecin, Zachodniopomorskie, Poland]
biography.bio: Roland Kuchenbuch was born on February 22, 1943 in Stettin, Pomerania, Germany [now Szczecin, Zachodniopomorskie, Poland]. He is an actor, known for Rückwärts laufen kann ich auch (1990), Never Mind the Wall (2001) and La poursuite infernale (1994).
biography.name: Roland Kuchenbuch

biography.bio: Andrea Meissner was born in 1957 in Rudolstadt, Thuringia, Germany. She is an actress, known for La poursuite infernale (1994), Apfelbäume (1992) and Hannes (1988).
biography.name: Andrea Meissner

biography.bio: Marliese Mirkoff is an actress, known for Zille and Me (1983), Der Junge mit dem großen schwarzen Hund (1986) and Verbotene Liebe (1995).
biography.name: Marliese Mirkoff

biography.bio: Peter Pauli was born in 1940 in Germany. He is an actor, known for In der Überzahl (2013), L'inspectrice de police (2000) and Whisky avec vodka (2009).
biography.name: Peter Pauli

biography.bio: Janine Pozinski is an actress, known for Der Junge mit dem großen schwarzen Hund (1986).
biography.name: Janine Pozinski
